text:
A spurious liquor manufacturing unit was busted in Cheyyar.

Acting on a tip off, police raided a secluded building in Poomanthangal village near Cheyyar on Friday evening and found spurious liquor bottles, bottle packing machine, empty bottles, bottle caps, stickers, rectified spirit etc.

They were all seized. Three persons namely Kangan (40), Vijayavelu (25) and Kanniyammal (50), all from Cheyyar, were arrested and remanded. — Staff Reporter
title: Spurious liquor unit busted, 3 held
